title: \_ Is there a way to add an e-mail subscription to a topic?
content:
Hello -

All is said in the title,  
Is there a way to add some e-mail subscription to a topic you enter (a new one)?

Thank you,

- Dimitri
author: dimitri_c

comments.content:
Short answer: no.  
You can always send a [feature request](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803035925/http:/www.typophile.com/contact).

F
Second-best solution: visit your Typophile account page and click on "Track" to see if there are any new comments.
